   20: -module(gen_sctp_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet_sctp.hrl").
   24: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%-compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   29: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   30: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   31: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: -export([
   33:          skip_old_solaris/1,
   34:          basic/1,
   35:          api_open_close/1,api_listen/1,api_connect_init/1,api_connectx_init/1,api_opts/1,
   36:          xfer_min/1,xfer_active/1,def_sndrcvinfo/1,implicit_inet6/1,
   37:          open_multihoming_ipv4_socket/1,
   38:          open_unihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   39:          open_multihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   40:          open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket/1,
   41:          basic_stream/1, xfer_stream_min/1, active_n/1,
   42:          peeloff_active_once/1, peeloff_active_true/1, peeloff_active_n/1,
   43:          buffers/1,
   44:          names_unihoming_ipv4/1, names_unihoming_ipv6/1,
   45:          names_multihoming_ipv4/1, names_multihoming_ipv6/1,
   46:          recv_close/1,
   47: 
   48:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   49:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   50:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   51:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   52:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init/1
   53:         ]).
   54: 
   55: suite() ->
   56:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   57:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   58: 
   59: all() ->
   60:     G = case is_old_solaris() of
   61: 	    true -> old_solaris;
   62: 	    false -> extensive
   63: 	end,
   64:     [
   65:      {group, smoke},
   66:      {group, G},
   67:      {group, sockaddr}].
   68: 
   69: groups() -> 
   70:     [
   71:      {smoke,       [], smoke_cases()},
   72:      {old_solaris, [], old_solaris_cases()},
   73:      {extensive,   [], extensive_cases()},
   74: 
   75:      {sockaddr,    [], sockaddr_cases()}
   76:     ].
   77: 
   78: smoke_cases() ->
   79:     [
   80:      basic,
   81:      basic_stream
   82:     ].
   83: 
   84: old_solaris_cases() ->
   85:     [
   86:      skip_old_solaris
   87:     ].
   88: 
   89: extensive_cases() ->
   90:     [
   91:      api_open_close, api_listen, api_connect_init, api_connectx_init,
   92:      api_opts, xfer_min, xfer_active, def_sndrcvinfo, implicit_inet6,
   93:      open_multihoming_ipv4_socket,
   94:      open_unihoming_ipv6_socket,
   95:      open_multihoming_ipv6_socket,
   96:      open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket, active_n,
   97:      xfer_stream_min, peeloff_active_once,
   98:      peeloff_active_true, peeloff_active_n, buffers,
   99:      names_unihoming_ipv4, names_unihoming_ipv6,
  100:      names_multihoming_ipv4, names_multihoming_ipv6,
  101:      recv_close
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: sockaddr_cases() ->
  105:     [
  106:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  107:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  108:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  109:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  110:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init
  111:     ].
  112: 
  113: 
  114: %% This (Config) was ignored before, why?
  115: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  116: 
  117:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  118:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  119:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  120: 
  121:     case gen_sctp:open() of
  122: 	{ok, Socket} ->
  123: 	    gen_sctp:close(Socket),
  124: 
  125:             case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  126:                 {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  127:                     SKIP;
  128: 
  129:                 Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  130: 
  131:                     ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  132:                        "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  133: 
  134:                     %% We need a monitor on this node also
  135:                     kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  136: 
  137:                     Config1
  138:             end;
  139: 
  140: 	{error, Error}
  141: 	  when Error =:= eprotonosupport;
  142: 	       Error =:= esocktnosupport ->
  143: 	    {skip,"SCTP not supported on this machine"}
  144:     end.
  145: 
  146: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  147: 
  148:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  149:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  150:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  151: 
  152:     %% Stop the local monitor
  153:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  154: 
  155:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  156: 
  157:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  158:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  159: 
  160:     Config1.
  161: 
  162: init_per_group(sockaddr = _GroupName, Config) ->
  163:     ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> do we support 'socket'"),
  164:     try socket:info() of
  165: 	_ ->
  166:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we support 'socket'"),
  167:             Config
  168:     catch
  169:         error : notsup ->
  170:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we *do not* support 'socket'"),
  171:             {skip, "esock not supported"};
  172:         error : undef ->
  173:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> 'socket' not configured"),
  174:             {skip, "esock not configured"}
  175:     end;
  176: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  177:     Config.
  178: 
  179: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  180:     Config.
  181: 
  182: 
  183: init_per_testcase(api_connectx_init=Case, Config) ->
  184:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  185: init_per_testcase(t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init=Case, Config) ->
  186:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  187: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  188:     init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config).
  189:     
  190: init_per_testcase_common(_Case, Config) ->
  191: 
  192:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  193:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  194:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  195:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  196:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  197:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  198: 
  199:     kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  200: 
  201:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> done when"
  202:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  203:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  204:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  205: 
  206:     Config.
  207: 
  208: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  209:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  210:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  211:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  212:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  213:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  214:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  215: 
  216:     ?P("system events during test: "
  217:        "~n   ~p", [kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  218: 
  219:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> done with"
  220:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  221:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  222:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  223:     ok.
  224: 
  225: 
  226: -define(LOGVAR(Var), begin io:format(??Var" = ~p~n", [Var]) end).
  227: -define(no_return(Expr), error({unexpected, Expr})).
  228: 
  229: check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config) ->
  230:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([]),
  231:     try
  232:         {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  233:         case gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [{127,0,0,1}], Pb, []) of
  234:             {error, enotsup} ->
  235:                 {skip, "sctp_connectx unsupported"};
  236:             _ ->
  237:                 init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config)
  238:         end
  239:     after
  240:         gen_sctp:close(S)
  241:     end.
  242: 
  243: is_old_solaris() ->
  244:     os:type() =:= {unix,sunos} andalso os:version() < {5,12,0}.
  245: 
  246: skip_old_solaris(_Config) ->
  247:     {skip,"Unreliable test cases and/or implementation on old Solaris"}.
  248: 
  249: %% Hello world.
  250: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  251:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  252:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  253:     ok.
  254: 
  255: %% Minimal data transfer.
  256: xfer_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  257:     Stream = 0,
  258:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  259:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  260:     StatOpts =
  261: 	[recv_avg,recv_cnt,recv_max,recv_oct,
  262: 	 send_avg,send_cnt,send_max,send_oct],
  263:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
  264:     {ok,SbStat1} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  265:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  266:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  267: 
  268:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  269:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  270:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  271: 			   error=0,
  272: 			   outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  273: 			   inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  274: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}=SaAssocChange} =
  275: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  276:     {SbAssocId,SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams} =
  277: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
  278: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  279: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  280: 				error=0,
  281: 				outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  282: 				inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  283: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  284: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams};
  285: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  286: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  287: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
  288: 				error=0,
  289: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  290: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  291: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  292: 				    error=0,
  293: 				    outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  294: 				    inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  295: 				    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  296: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  297: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams}
  298: 	end,
  299: 
  300:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
  301:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
  302: 	{Loopback,
  303: 	 Pa,
  304: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
  305: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
  306: 	 Data} -> ok;
  307: 	Event1 ->
  308: 	    case recv_event(Event1) of
  309: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  310: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{addr = {Loopback,_},
  311: 				    state = State,
  312: 				    error = 0,
  313: 				    assoc_id = SbAssocId}}
  314: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  315: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  316: 		    {Loopback,
  317: 		     Pa,
  318: 		     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  319: 				       assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  320: 		     Data} = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))
  321: 	    end
  322:     end,
  323:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  324:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
  325: 	{Loopback,Pb,
  326: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  327: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  328: 	 Data} ->
  329: 	    ok;
  330: 	Event2 ->
  331: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
  332: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{addr={_,Pb},
  333: 				state=addr_confirmed,
  334: 				error=0,
  335: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  336: 		recv_event(Event2),
  337: 	    {Loopback,
  338: 	     Pb,
  339: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  340: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  341: 	     Data} =
  342: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
  343:     end,
  344:     %%
  345:     ok = gen_sctp:eof(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  346:     {Loopback,Pa,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  347: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  348:     {Loopback,Pb,
  349:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  350: 			error=0,
  351: 			assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  352: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  353:     {Loopback,Pa,
  354:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  355: 			error=0,
  356: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  357: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  358:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  359:     {ok,SbStat2} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  360:     [] = filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2),
  361:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  362: 
  363:     receive
  364: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
  365:     after 17 -> ok
  366:     end,
  367:     ok.
  368: 
  369: filter_stat_eq([], []) ->
  370:     [];
  371: filter_stat_eq([{Tag,Val1}=Stat|SbStat1], [{Tag,Val2}|SbStat2]) ->
  372:     if
  373: 	Val1 == Val2 ->
  374: 	    [Stat|filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)];
  375: 	true ->
  376: 	    filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)
  377:     end.
  378: 
  379: 
  380: 
  381: %% Minimal data transfer in active mode.
  382: xfer_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  383:     Timeout = 2000,
  384:     Stream = 0,
  385:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  386:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  387:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  388:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  389:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  390: 
  391:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  392:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  393:     ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  394:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  395: 		       error=0,
  396: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  397: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  398: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId} = SaAssocChange =
  399: 	recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout),
  400:     io:format("Sa=~p, Pa=~p, Sb=~p, Pb=~p, SaAssocId=~p, "
  401: 	      "SaOutboundStreams=~p, SaInboundStreams=~p~n",
  402: 	      [Sa,Pa,Sb,Pb,SaAssocId,
  403: 	       SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams]),
  404:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  405: 		       error=0,
  406: 		       outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  407: 		       inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  408: 		       assoc_id=SbAssocId} =
  409: 	recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout),
  410:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
  411:     SbInboundStreams = SaOutboundStreams,
  412:     io:format("SbAssocId=~p~n", [SbAssocId]),
  413: 
  414:     case recv_paddr_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, 314) of
  415: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  416: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  417: 			   error=0,
  418: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  419: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  420: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  421: 			   error=0,
  422: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  423: 	timeout -> ok
  424:     end,
  425:     case recv_paddr_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, 314) of
  426: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  427: 			   addr={Loopback,Pa},
  428: 			   error=0,
  429: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  430: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  431: 			   addr={Loopback,P},
  432: 			   error=0,
  433: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} ->
  434: 	    match_unless_solaris(Pa, P);
  435: 	timeout -> ok
  436:     end,
  437:     [] = flush(),
  438: 
  439:     ok =
  440: 	do_from_other_process(
  441: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data) end),
  442:     receive
  443: 	{sctp,Sb,Loopback,Pa,
  444: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  445: 			    assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  446: 	  Data}} -> ok
  447:     after Timeout ->
  448: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  449:     end,
  450:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  451:     receive
  452: 	{sctp,Sa,Loopback,Pb,
  453: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  454: 			    assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  455: 	  Data}} -> ok
  456:     after Timeout ->
  457: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  458:     end,
  459:     %%
  460:     ok = gen_sctp:abort(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  461:     case recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout) of
  462: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  463: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  464: 	timeout ->
  465: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  466:     end,
  467:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  468:     case recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout) of
  469: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  470: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  471: 	timeout ->
  472: 	    io:format("timeout waiting for comm_lost on Sa~n"),
  473: 	    match_unless_solaris(ok, {timeout,flush()})
  474:     end,
  475:     receive
  476: 	{sctp_error,Sa,enotconn} -> ok % Solaris
  477:     after 17 -> ok
  478:     end,
  479:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  480:     %%
  481:     receive
  482: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,[Msg]++flush()})
  483:     after 17 -> ok
  484:     end,
  485:     ok.
  486: 
  487: recv_assoc_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  488:     receive
  489: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_assoc_change{}=AssocChange}} ->
  490: 	    AssocChange;
  491: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  492: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  493: 	  #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=AssocChange}} ->
  494: 	    AssocChange
  495:     after Timeout ->
  496: 	    timeout
  497:     end.
  498: 
  499: recv_paddr_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  500:     receive
  501: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_paddr_change{}=PaddrChange}} ->
  502: 	    PaddrChange;
  503: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  504: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  505: 	  #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=PaddrChange}} ->
  506: 	    PaddrChange
  507:     after Timeout ->
  508: 	    timeout
  509:     end.
  510: 
  511: %% Test that #sctp_sndrcvinfo{} parameters set on a socket
  512: %% are used by gen_sctp:send/4.
  513: def_sndrcvinfo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  514:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  515:     Data = <<"What goes up, must come down.">>,
  516:     %%
  517:     S1 =
  518: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open(
  519: 		 0, [{sctp_default_send_param,#sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17}}])),
  520:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
  521:     P1 =
  522: 	log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
  523:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
  524:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  525: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  526:     ok =
  527: 	gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
  528:     %%
  529:     S2 =
  530: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open()),
  531:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
  532:     P2 =
  533: 	log_ok(inet:port(S2)),
  534:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
  535:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  536: 	getopt(S2, sctp_default_send_param),
  537:     %%
  538:     #sctp_assoc_change{
  539:        state=comm_up,
  540:        error=0,
  541:        assoc_id=S2AssocId} = S2AssocChange =
  542: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Loopback, P1, [])),
  543:     ?LOGVAR(S2AssocChange),
  544:     S1AssocId =
  545: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))) of
  546: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  547: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{
  548: 		state=comm_up,
  549: 		error=0,
  550: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  551: 		AssocId;
  552: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  553: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{
  554: 		state=addr_confirmed,
  555: 		error=0,
  556: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  557: 		{Loopback,P2,
  558: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  559: 		    state=comm_up,
  560: 		    error=0,
  561: 		    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  562: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))),
  563: 		AssocId
  564: 	end,
  565:     ?LOGVAR(S1AssocId),
  566: 
  567:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  568:        ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  569: 	getopt(
  570: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  571:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  572:        ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S2AssocId} =
  573: 	getopt(
  574: 	  S2, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S2AssocId}),
  575:     %%
  576:     ok =
  577: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 1, <<"1: ",Data/binary>>),
  578:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  579: 	{Loopback,P1,
  580: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  581: 	     stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  582: 	 <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  583: 	Event1 ->
  584: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  585: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  586: 				addr={_,P1},
  587: 				error=0,
  588: 				assoc_id=S2AssocId}} =
  589: 		recv_event(Event1),
  590: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  591: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  592: 		 stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  593: 	     <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} =
  594: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2))
  595:     end,
  596:     %%
  597:     ok =
  598: 	setopt(
  599: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=18}),
  600:     ok =
  601: 	setopt(
  602: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param,
  603: 	  #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=19, assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  604:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  605:        ppid=18, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  606: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  607:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  608:        ppid=19, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  609: 	getopt(
  610: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  611:     %%
  612:     ok =
  613: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 0, <<"2: ",Data/binary>>),
  614:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  615: 	{Loopback,P1,
  616: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  617: 	     stream=0, ppid=19, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  618: 	 <<"2: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  619:     end,
  620:     ok =
  621: 	gen_sctp:send(S2, S2AssocChange, 1, <<"3: ",Data/binary>>),
  622:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  623: 	{Loopback,P2,
  624: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  625: 	     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  626: 	 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  627: 	Event2 ->
  628: 	    case recv_event(Event2) of
  629: 		{Loopback,P2,
  630: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{
  631: 		    addr={Loopback,_},
  632: 		    state=State,
  633: 		    error=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}}
  634: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  635: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  636: 		    case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  637: 			{Loopback,P2,
  638: 			 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  639: 			     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0,
  640: 			     assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  641: 			 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  642: 		    end
  643: 	    end
  644:     end,
  645:     ok =
  646: 	do_from_other_process(
  647: 	  fun () ->
  648: 		  gen_sctp:send(
  649: 		    S2,
  650: 		    #sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=0, ppid=20, assoc_id=S2AssocId},
  651: 		    <<"4: ",Data/binary>>)
  652: 	  end),
  653:     case log_ok(do_from_other_process(fun() -> gen_sctp:recv(S1) end)) of
  654: 	{Loopback,P2,
  655: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  656: 	     stream=0, ppid=20, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  657: 	 <<"4: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  658:     end,
  659:     %%
  660:     ok =
  661: 	gen_sctp:close(S1),
  662:     ok =
  663: 	gen_sctp:close(S2),
  664:     receive
  665: 	Msg ->
  666: 	    ct:fail({received,Msg})
  667:     after 17 -> ok
  668:     end,
  669:     ok.
  670: 
  671: getopt(S, Opt) ->
  672:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [Opt]),
  673:     Val.
  674: 
  675: getopt(S, Opt, Param) ->
  676:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [{Opt,Param}]),
  677:     Val.
  678: 
  679: setopt(S, Opt, Val) ->
  680:     inet:setopts(S, [{Opt,Val}]).
  681: 
  682: 
  683: flush() ->
  684:     receive
  685: 	Msg ->
  686: 	    [Msg|flush()]
  687:     after 17 ->
  688: 	    []
  689:     end.
  690: 
  691: %% Test the API function open/1,2 and close/1.
  692: api_open_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  693:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_api_open_close() end).
  694: 
  695: do_api_open_close() ->
  696:     {ok,S1} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  697:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S1),
  698:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  699: 
  700:     {ok,S2} = gen_sctp:open(P),
  701:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S2),
  702:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  703: 
  704:     {ok,S3} = gen_sctp:open([{port,P}]),
  705:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S3),
  706:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S3),
  707: 
  708:     {ok,S4} = gen_sctp:open(P, []),
  709:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S4),
  710:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S4),
  711: 
  712:     {ok,S5} = gen_sctp:open(P, [{debug, false}, {ifaddr,any}, {debug, true}]),
  713:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S5),
  714:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  715: 
  716:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  717: 
  718:     try gen_sctp:close(0)
  719:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  720:     end,
  721: 
  722:     try gen_sctp:open({})
  723:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  724:     end,
  725: 
  726:     try gen_sctp:open(-1)
  727:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  728:     end,
  729: 
  730:     try gen_sctp:open(65536)
  731:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  732:     end,
  733: 
  734:     try gen_sctp:open(make_ref(), [])
  735:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  736:     end,
  737: 
  738:     try gen_sctp:open(0, {})
  739:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  740:     end,
  741: 
  742:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [make_ref()])
  743:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  744:     end,
  745: 
  746:     try gen_sctp:open([{invalid_option,0}])
  747:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  748:     end,
  749: 
  750:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [{mode,invalid_mode}])
  751:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  752:     end,
  753:     ok.
  754: 
  755: %% Test the API function listen/2.
  756: api_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  757:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  758: 
  759:     try gen_sctp:listen(0, true)
  760:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  761:     end,
  762: 
  763:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  764:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  765:     try gen_sctp:listen(S, not_allowed_for_listen)
  766:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  767:     end,
  768:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  769:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
  770: 
  771:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  772:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  773: 
  774:     element(1, os:type()) =:= unix andalso
  775:         begin
  776:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, "", 65535, []),
  777:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '', 65535, [])
  778:         end,
  779:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, ".", 65535, []),
  780:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '.', 65535, []),
  781: 
  782:     case gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  783: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  784: 	    {ok,{Localhost,
  785: 		 Pb,[],
  786: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  787: 		    state=comm_lost}}} =
  788: 		gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity);
  789: 	{error,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} ->
  790: 	    ok%;
  791: 	    %% {error,{Localhost,Pb,_,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}}} ->
  792: 	    %% 	  ok
  793:     end,
  794:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  795:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  796: 			   error=0}} =
  797: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []),
  798:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  799:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  800:     ok.
  801: 
  802: %% Test the API function connect_init/4.
  803: api_connect_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  804:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  805: 
  806:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  807:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  808:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, not_allowed_for_port, [])
  809:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  810:     end,
  811:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, not_allowed_for_opts)
  812:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  813:     end,
  814:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  815:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []),
  816: 
  817:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  818:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  819:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  820: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  821: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost}} =
  822: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)));
  823: 	ok ->
  824: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} =
  825: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  826:     end,
  827:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  828:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  829: 	ok ->
  830: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}} =
  831: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  832:     end,
  833:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  834:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  835:     ok.
  836: 
  837: %% Test the API function connectx_init/4.
  838: api_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  839:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  840: 
  841:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  842:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  843:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []))
  844:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  845:     end,
  846:     {error, einval} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []),
  847:     %% try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []))
  848:     %% catch error:badarg -> ok
  849:     %% end,
  850:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, not_allowed_for_opts))
  851:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  852:     end,
  853:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  854:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, []),
  855: 
  856:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  857:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  858:     {ok, A1} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  859:     true = (A1 =/= 0),
  860:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
  861: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  862:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  863:     {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  864:     true = (A2 =/= 0),
  865:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
  866: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  867:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  868:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  869:     ok.
  870: 
  871: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_assoc_change{} = AssocChange}) ->
  872:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  873: recv_event({Addr,Port,
  874: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  875: 	    #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = AssocChange}) ->
  876:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  877: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_paddr_change{} = PaddrChange}) ->
  878:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  879: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  880: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  881: 	    #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = PaddrChange}) ->
  882:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  883: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_shutdown_event{} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  884:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent};
  885: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  886: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id    = Assoc}],
  887: 	    #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id = Assoc} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  888:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent}.
  889: 
  890: %% Test socket options.
  891: api_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  892:     Sndbuf = 32768,
  893:     Recbuf = 65536,
  894:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  895:     OSType = os:type(),
  896:     case {inet:setopts(S, [{linger,{true,2}}]),OSType} of
  897: 	{ok,_} ->
  898: 	    ok;
  899: 	{{error,einval},{unix,sunos}} ->
  900: 	    ok
  901:     end,
  902:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{sndbuf,Sndbuf}]),
  903:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{recbuf,Recbuf}]),
  904:     case inet:getopts(S, [sndbuf]) of
  905: 	{ok, [{sndbuf,SB}]} when SB >= Sndbuf -> ok
  906:     end,
  907:     case inet:getopts(S, [recbuf]) of
  908: 	{ok, [{recbuf, RB}]} when (RB >= Recbuf) -> ok
  909:     end.
  910: 
  911: %% What is this *actually* supposed to test?
  912: implicit_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  913:     ?TC_TRY(implicit_inet6, fun() -> do_implicit_inet6(Config) end).
  914: 
  915: do_implicit_inet6(_Config) ->
  916:     ?P("begin"),
  917:     %% First
  918:     ?P("try create server socket (1)"),
  919:     case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6]) of
  920: 	{ok, S1} ->
  921:             Loopback = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},
  922:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["Loopback", Loopback]),
  923:             implicit_inet6(S1, Loopback),
  924:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  925:             
  926:             %% Second
  927:             ?P("try create server socket (2)"),
  928:             Localhost =
  929:                 case inet:getaddr("localhost", inet6) of
  930:                     {ok, LH} ->
  931:                         LH;
  932:                     {error, nxdomain = Reason_getaddr} ->
  933:                         ?SKIPT(Reason_getaddr);
  934:                     {error, Reason_getaddr} ->
  935:                         ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_getaddr})
  936:                 end,
  937:             S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip, Localhost}]) of
  938:                      {ok, S} ->
  939:                          S;
  940:                      {error, nxdomain = Reason_open} ->
  941:                          ?SKIPT(Reason_open);
  942:                      {error, Reason_open} ->
  943:                          ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_open})
  944:                  end,
  945: 
  946:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["localhost", Localhost]),
  947:             implicit_inet6(S2, Localhost),
  948:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  949:             
  950:             %% Third
  951:             ?P("try create server socket (3)"),
  952:             Hostname = log_ok(inet:gethostname()),
  953:             Addr     = case inet:getaddr(Hostname, inet6) of
  954:                            {ok, A} ->
  955:                                A;
  956:                            {error, eafnosupport} ->
  957:                                ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  958:                                ?SKIPT("Can not look up IPv6 address")
  959:                        end,
  960:             S3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ifaddr, Addr}])),
  961:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", [Hostname, Addr]),
  962:             implicit_inet6(S3, Addr),
  963:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  964:             ?P("done"),
  965:             ok;
  966:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
  967:             ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason));
  968:         _ ->
  969:             {skip, "IPv6 not supported"}
  970:     end.
  971: 
  972: 
  973: implicit_inet6(S1, Addr) ->
  974:     ?P("make (server) listen socket"),
  975:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
  976:     ServerPortNo = log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
  977:     ?P("try create (client) socket"),
  978:     S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6, {ifaddr, Addr}]) of
  979:              {ok, Sock} ->
  980:                  ?P("client socket created: ~p", [Sock]),
  981:                  Sock;
  982:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
  983:                  ?P("could not create (client) socket with ifaddr: "
  984:                     "~n   ~p", [Addr]),
  985:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason))
  986:     end,
  987:     {ClientAddr, ClientPortNo} = log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)),
  988:     ?P("try connect"
  989:        "~n   from (connector): ~p, ~p (~p)"
  990:        "~n   to:               ~p, ~p",
  991:        [ClientAddr, ClientPortNo, S2, Addr, ServerPortNo]),
  992:     #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} =
  993: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Addr, ServerPortNo, [])),
  994:     ?P("connect success: await events"),
  995:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(S1, ClientAddr, ClientPortNo),
  996:     ?P("verify server sockname"),
  997:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S1)) of
  998: 	{Addr,              ServerPortNo} -> ok;
  999: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ServerPortNo} -> ok
 1000:     end,
 1001:     ?P("verify client sockname"),
 1002:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)) of
 1003: 	{Addr,              ClientPortNo} -> ok;
 1004: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ClientPortNo} -> ok
 1005:     end,
 1006:     ?P("client client socket"),
 1007:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1008:     ?P("verification complete"),
 1009:     ok.
 1010: 
 1011: 
 1012: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo) ->
 1013:     {_OsFam, OsName} = os:type(),
 1014:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName).
 1015: 
 1016: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName) ->
 1017:     case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sock))) of
 1018: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}} ->
 1019:             ?P("received assoc-change:comm-up event => done"),
 1020: 	    ok;
 1021: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed,
 1022:                                           addr  = {Addr, PortNo},
 1023:                                           error = 0}} ->
 1024:             ?P("received paddr-change:addr-confirmed event - "
 1025:                "try recv assoc-change:comm-up"),
 1026:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1027: 
 1028: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}
 1029:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1030:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from unexpected address: "
 1031:                "~n   Unexpected Address: ~p, ~p"
 1032:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1033:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1034:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1035:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1036: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed}}
 1037:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1038:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1039:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1040:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1041:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1042:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1043:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1044:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1045: 
 1046: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1047:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1048:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1049:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1050:                "~n   Assoc Change:       ~p"
 1051:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1052:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1053: 
 1054: 	{AX, PX, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1055:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1056:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1057:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1058:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1059:                "~n   PAddr Change:       ~p"
 1060:                "~n", [AX, PX, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1061:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1062: 
 1063:         {AX, PX, CX} = UNEX ->
 1064:             ?P("UNEXPECTED EVENT: "
 1065:                "~n   ~p"
 1066:                "~n   UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: ~p, ~p"
 1067:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1068:                "~n", [CX, AX, PX, Addr, PortNo]),
 1069:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX})
 1070:     end.
 1071: 
 1072: 
 1073: %% Verify {active, N} socket management.
 1074: %% This is difficult to do since we do not just receive data messages.
 1075: %% Also, how do we know that sctp behaves the same way on all platforms?
 1076: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1077:     ?TC_TRY(active_n, fun() -> do_active_n(Config) end).
 1078: 
 1079: do_active_n(_Config) ->
 1080:     N = 3,
 1081:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,N}])),
 1082:     [{active,N}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1083:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-N}]),
 1084:     receive
 1085:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1086:     after
 1087:         5000 ->
 1088:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1089:     end,
 1090:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1091:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,0}]),
 1092:     receive
 1093:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1094:     after
 1095:         5000 ->
 1096:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1097:     end,
 1098:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32767}]),
 1099:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,1}]),
 1100:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32769}]),
 1101:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32768}]),
 1102:     receive
 1103:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1104:     after
 1105:         5000 ->
 1106:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1107:     end,
 1108:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1109:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1110:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,true}]),
 1111:     [{active,true}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1112:     receive
 1113:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1114:     after
 1115:         0 ->
 1116:             ok
 1117:     end,
 1118:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1119:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,once}]),
 1120:     [{active,once}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1121:     receive
 1122:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1123:     after
 1124:         0 ->
 1125:             ok
 1126:     end,
 1127:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32768}]),
 1128:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,false}]),
 1129:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1130:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1131:     S1Port = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1132:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{active,false}])),
 1133:     Assoc = ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, "localhost", S1Port, [])),
 1134:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1135:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(S1),
 1136:     active_n_send_loop(N, S2, Assoc, S1),
 1137:     S3 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,0}])),
 1138:     receive
 1139:         {sctp_passive,S3} ->
 1140:             [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S3, [active]))
 1141:     after
 1142:         5000 ->
 1143:             exit({error,udp_passive})
 1144:     end,
 1145:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S3),
 1146:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1147:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1148:     ok.
 1149: 
 1150: 
 1151: %% There is no way to know how many addresses this host has,
 1152: %% and if there is "too many" (more then N = 3), then the
 1153: %% socket may already be passive. In this case the send-
 1154: %% loop will fail.
 1155: %% So, if we get a passive-message here, we just give up (=skip).
 1156: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1157:     %% This seems only to be needed on certain platforms
 1158:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(os:type(), Sock).
 1159: 
 1160: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, Sock) ->
 1161:     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock).
 1162: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs({unix, freebsd}, Sock) ->
 1163: %%     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1164: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, _) ->
 1165: %%     ok.
 1166: 
 1167: do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1168:     receive
 1169:         {sctp_passive, Sock} ->
 1170:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> premature passive"),
 1171:             ?SKIPT("Too many addresses (premature passive)");
 1172: 
 1173:         {sctp, Sock,
 1174:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1175:          {[], #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}} ->
 1176:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1177:                "connect message discard - assoc change : comm-up"),
 1178:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1179:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1180: 
 1181:         {sctp, Sock,
 1182:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1183:          {[], #sctp_paddr_change{state    = addr_confirmed,
 1184:                                  addr     = Addr,
 1185:                                  error    = Error,
 1186:                                  assoc_id = AID}}} ->
 1187:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1188:                "connect message discard - paddr change : addr-confirmed:"
 1189:                "~n   Addr:    ~p"
 1190:                "~n   Error:   ~p"
 1191:                "~n   AssocID: ~p", [Addr, Error, AID]),
 1192:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1193:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock)
 1194: 
 1195:     after 5000 ->
 1196:             ok
 1197:     end.
 1198:             
 1199: active_n_send_loop(Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock) ->
 1200:     active_n_send_loop(0, Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock).
 1201: 
 1202: active_n_send_loop(Count, Count, _SndSock, _SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1203:     ?P("send-loop -> we are done - wait for passive"),
 1204:     receive
 1205:         {sctp_passive, RcvSock} ->
 1206:             ?P("received passive"),
 1207:             ok
 1208:     after
 1209:         5000 ->
 1210:             ?P("UNEXPECTED TIMEOUT: "
 1211:                "~n   Message Queue:    ~p"
 1212:                "~n   Active:           ~p",
 1213:                [process_info(self(), messages),
 1214:                 inet:getopts(RcvSock, [active])]),
 1215:             exit({error, timeout})
 1216:     end;
 1217: 
 1218: active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1219:     Msg = list_to_binary("message " ++ integer_to_list(Sent+1)),
 1220:     ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> send message (on ~p)", [Sent, Count, SndSock]),
 1221:     ok = gen_sctp:send(SndSock, SndAssoc, 0, Msg),
 1222:     receive
 1223:         {sctp, RcvSock, FromIP, FromPort, {[SR], Msg}}
 1224:         when is_record(SR, sctp_sndrcvinfo) ->
 1225:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1226:                "recv (expected) data message (on ~p):"
 1227:                "~n   Msg:  ~p"
 1228:                "~n   From: ~p, ~p",
 1229:                [Sent, Count,
 1230:                 RcvSock, Msg, FromIP, FromPort]),
 1231:             active_n_send_loop(Sent+1, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1232:         
 1233:         {sctp, RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, {_AncData, _Data}} ->
 1234:             %% ignore non-data messages
 1235:             %% we should not get any here because of the flush loop,
 1236:             %% but just in case...
 1237:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1238:                "ignore non-data messages (on ~p):"
 1239:                "~n   From:    ~p:~p"
 1240:                "~n   AncData: ~p"
 1241:                "~n   Data:    ~p",
 1242:                [Sent, Count,
 1243:                 RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, _AncData, _Data]),
 1244:             
 1245:             %% It may be too late to update here,
 1246:             %% the socket may already have gone passive 
 1247:             %% and generated a passive message!
 1248:             
 1249:             ok = inet:setopts(RcvSock, [{active, 1}]),
 1250: 
 1251:             active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1252:         
 1253:         Other ->
 1254:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1255:                "UNEXPECTED: "
 1256:                "~n   Other:     ~p"
 1257:                "~n   Send Sock: ~p"
 1258:                "~n   Recv Sock: ~p", [Sent, Count,
 1259:                                       Other, SndSock, RcvSock]),
 1260:             exit({unexpected, Other})
 1261:     after
 1262:         5000 ->
 1263:             exit({error,timeout})
 1264:     end.
 1265:     
 1266: %% Hello world stream socket.
 1267: basic_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1268:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1269:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1270:     ok =
 1271: 	do_from_other_process(
 1272: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:listen(S, 10) end),
 1273:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 1274:     ok.
 1275: 
 1276: %% Minimal data transfer.
 1277: xfer_stream_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1278:     {_, OSName} = os:type(),
 1279:     Stream = 0,
 1280:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
 1281:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
 1282:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
 1283:     ?LOGVAR(Sb),
 1284:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 1285:     ?LOGVAR(Pb),
 1286:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 1287: 
 1288:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1289:     ?LOGVAR(Sa),
 1290:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
 1291:     ?LOGVAR(Pa),
 1292:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1293: 		       error=0,
 1294: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
 1295: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
 1296: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId_X} =
 1297: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, [])),
 1298:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId_X),
 1299:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=SaAssocId,state=active}}] =
 1300: 	log_ok(inet:getopts(Sa, [{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1301: 				  #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Loopback,Pb}}}])),
 1302:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId),
 1303:     match_unless_solaris(SaAssocId_X, SaAssocId),
 1304: 
 1305:     {SbOutboundStreams,SbInboundStreams,SbAssocId} =
 1306: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
 1307: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1308: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1309: 				error=0,
 1310: 				outbound_streams=OS,
 1311: 				inbound_streams=IS,
 1312: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1313: 		{OS,IS,AI};
 1314: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1315: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1316: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
 1317: 				error=0,
 1318: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1319: 		{Loopback,Pa,
 1320: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1321: 				    error=0,
 1322: 				    outbound_streams=OS,
 1323: 				    inbound_streams=IS,
 1324: 				    assoc_id=AI}} =
 1325: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1326: 		{OS,IS,AI}
 1327: 	end,
 1328:     ?LOGVAR(SbAssocId),
 1329:     SaOutboundStreams = SbInboundStreams,
 1330:     ?LOGVAR(SaOutboundStreams),
 1331:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
 1332:     ?LOGVAR(SbOutboundStreams),
 1333:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
 1334:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
 1335: 	{Loopback,
 1336: 	 Pa,
 1337: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1338: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1339: 	 Data} ->
 1340:             ?P("[1] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1341:             ok;
 1342: 
 1343: 	{Loopback,
 1344: 	 Pa,
 1345:          [],
 1346: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1347: 			    state    = addr_available,
 1348: 			    error    = 0,
 1349: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1350:             ?P("[2] received paddr change => recv again"),
 1351:             Res2 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1352:             ?P("[2] recv ok => "
 1353:                "~n   ~p", [Res2]),
 1354: 	    {Loopback,
 1355: 	     Pa,
 1356: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1357: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1358: 	     Data} = Res2,
 1359:             ?P("[2] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1360:             Res2;
 1361: 
 1362: 	{Loopback,
 1363: 	 Pa,
 1364: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream    = Stream,
 1365: 			   assoc_id  = SbAssocId}],
 1366: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1367: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1368: 			    error    = 0,
 1369: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1370:             ?P("[3] received paddr change with ancillary data => recv again"),
 1371:             Res3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1372:             ?P("[3] recv ok => "
 1373:                "~n   ~p", [Res3]),
 1374: 	    {Loopback,
 1375: 	     Pa,
 1376: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1377: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1378: 	     Data} = Res3,
 1379:             ?P("[3] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1380:             Res3;
 1381: 
 1382:         %% It seems that on FreeBSD (for instance) we don't get any
 1383:         %% AncData with this.
 1384: 	{Loopback,
 1385: 	 Pa,
 1386: 	 [],
 1387: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1388: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1389: 			    error    = 0,
 1390: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} when (OSName =:= freebsd) ->
 1391:             ?P("[4] received paddr change without ancillary data => "
 1392:                "recv again"),
 1393:             Res4 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1394:             ?P("[4] recv ok => "
 1395:                "~n   ~p", [Res4]),
 1396: 	    {Loopback,
 1397: 	     Pa,
 1398: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1399:                                assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1400: 	     Data} = Res4,
 1401:             ?P("[4] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1402:             Res4;
 1403: 
 1404:         {FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX} = Other1 ->
 1405:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1406:                "~n   FromIP:   ~p"
 1407:                "~n   FromPort: ~p"
 1408:                "~n   AncData:  ~p"
 1409:                "~n   Data:     ~p"
 1410:                "~nwhen"
 1411:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1412:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1413:                [FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX, Loopback, Pa]),
 1414:             exit({unexpected, Other1});
 1415:         Other2 ->
 1416:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1417:                "~n   Other:    ~p"
 1418:                "~nwhen"
 1419:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1420:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1421:                [Other2, Loopback, Pa]),
 1422:             exit({unexpected, Other2})
 1423:     end,
 1424:     ok =
 1425: 	do_from_other_process(
 1426: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data) end),
 1427:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
 1428: 	{Loopback,Pb,
 1429: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1430: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1431: 	 Data} -> ok;
 1432: 	Event1 ->
 1433: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1434: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1435: 				addr={_,Pb},
 1436: 				error=0,
 1437: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
 1438: 		recv_event(Event1),
 1439: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1440: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1441: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1442: 	     Data} =
 1443: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
 1444:     end,
 1445:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 1446:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1447:      #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1448: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1449:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1450:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1451: 			error=0,
 1452: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1453: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1454:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
 1455: 
 1456:     receive
 1457: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
 1458:     after 17 -> ok
 1459:     end,
 1460:     ok.
 1461: 
 1462: 
 1463: 
 1464: do_from_other_process(Fun) ->
 1465:     Parent = self(),
 1466:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1467:     Child =
 1468: 	spawn(fun () ->
 1469: 		      try Fun() of
 1470: 			  Result ->
 1471: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Result}
 1472: 		      catch
 1473: 			  Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 1474: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace}
 1475: 		      end
 1476: 	      end),
 1477:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Child),
 1478:     receive
 1479: 	{Ref,Result} ->
 1480: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> Result end;
 1481: 	{Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace} ->
 1482: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} ->
 1483: 		    erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1484: 	    end;
 1485: 	{'DOWN',Mref,_,_,Reason} ->
 1486: 	    erlang:exit(Reason)
 1487:     end.
 1488: 
 1489: 
 1490: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,once}).
 1491: 
 1492: peeloff_active_once(Config) ->
 1493:     peeloff(Config, [{active,once}]).
 1494: 
 1495: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,true}).
 1496: 
 1497: peeloff_active_true(Config) ->
 1498:     peeloff(Config, [{active,true}]).
 1499: 
 1500: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,N}).
 1501: 
 1502: peeloff_active_n(Config) ->
 1503:     peeloff(Config, [{active,1}]).
 1504: 
 1505: peeloff(Config, SockOpts) when is_list(Config) ->
 1506:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1507:     Stream = 0,
 1508:     Timeout = 333,
 1509:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1510:     S1 = socket_open([{ifaddr,Addr}|SockOpts], Timeout),
 1511:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
 1512:     P1 = socket_call(S1, get_port),
 1513:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
 1514:     Socket1 = socket_call(S1, get_socket),
 1515:     ?LOGVAR(Socket1),
 1516:     socket_call(S1, {listen,true}),
 1517:     S2 = socket_open([{ifaddr,Addr}|SockOpts], Timeout),
 1518:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
 1519:     P2 = socket_call(S2, get_port),
 1520:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
 1521:     Socket2 = socket_call(S2, get_socket),
 1522:     ?LOGVAR(Socket2),
 1523:     %%
 1524:     socket_call(S2, {connect_init,Addr,P1,[]}),
 1525:     S2Ai =
 1526: 	receive
 1527: 	    {S2,{Addr,P1,
 1528: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 1529: 		    state=comm_up,
 1530: 		    assoc_id=AssocId2}}} -> AssocId2
 1531: 	after Timeout ->
 1532: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1533: 	end,
 1534:     ?LOGVAR(S2Ai),
 1535:     S1Ai =
 1536: 	receive
 1537: 	    {S1,{Addr,P2,
 1538: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 1539: 		    state=comm_up,
 1540: 		    assoc_id=AssocId1}}} -> AssocId1
 1541: 	after Timeout ->
 1542: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1543: 	end,
 1544:     ?LOGVAR(S1Ai),
 1545:     %%
 1546:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}),
 1547:     receive
 1548: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}} -> ok
 1549:     after Timeout ->
 1550: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1551:     end,
 1552:     socket_call(S2, {send,Socket1,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}),
 1553:     receive
 1554: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}} -> ok
 1555:     after Timeout ->
 1556: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1557:     end,
 1558:     %%
 1559:     S3 = socket_peeloff(Socket1, S1Ai, SockOpts, Timeout),
 1560:     ?LOGVAR(S3),
 1561:     P3_X = socket_call(S3, get_port),
 1562:     ?LOGVAR(P3_X),
 1563:     P3 = case P3_X of 0 -> P1; _ -> P3_X end,
 1564:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=S3Ai,state=active}}] =
 1565: 	socket_call(S3,
 1566: 		    {getopts,[{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1567: 			       #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Addr,P2}}}]}),
 1568:     %%S3Ai = S1Ai,
 1569:     ?LOGVAR(S3Ai),
 1570:     %%
 1571:     socket_call(S3, {send,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}),
 1572:     receive
 1573: 	{S2,{Addr,P3,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}} -> ok
 1574:     after Timeout ->
 1575: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1576:     end,
 1577:     socket_call(S3, {send,Socket2,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}),
 1578:     receive
 1579: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}} -> ok
 1580:     after Timeout ->
 1581: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1582:     end,
 1583:     %%
 1584:     inet:i(sctp),
 1585:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 1586:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 1587:     receive
 1588: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S3Ai_X}}} ->
 1589: 	    match_unless_solaris(S3Ai, S3Ai_X)
 1590:     after Timeout ->
 1591: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1592:     end,
 1593:     receive
 1594: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1595: 					assoc_id=S3Ai}}} -> ok
 1596:     after Timeout ->
 1597: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1598:     end,
 1599:     socket_close_verbose(S3, StartTime),
 1600:     [] = flush(),
 1601:     ok.
 1602: 
 1603: 
 1604: 
 1605: %% Check sndbuf and recbuf behaviour.
 1606: buffers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1607:     Limit = 4096,
 1608:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1609:     Stream = 1,
 1610:     Timeout = 3333,
 1611:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1612:     S1 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 1613:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
 1614:     P1 = socket_call(S1, get_port),
 1615:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
 1616:     ok = socket_call(S1, {listen,true}),
 1617:     S2 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 1618:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
 1619:     P2 = socket_call(S2, get_port),
 1620:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
 1621:     %%
 1622:     socket_call(S2, {connect_init,Addr,P1,[]}),
 1623:     S2Ai =
 1624: 	receive
 1625: 	    {S2,{Addr,P1,
 1626: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 1627: 		    state=comm_up,
 1628: 		    assoc_id=AssocId2}}} -> AssocId2
 1629: 	after Timeout ->
 1630: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1631: 	end,
 1632:     S1Ai =
 1633: 	receive
 1634: 	    {S1,{Addr,P2,
 1635: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 1636: 		    state=comm_up,
 1637: 		    assoc_id=AssocId1}}} -> AssocId1
 1638: 	after Timeout ->
 1639: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1640: 	end,
 1641:     %%
 1642:     socket_call(S1, {setopts,[{recbuf,Limit}]}),
 1643:     Recbuf =
 1644: 	case socket_call(S1, {getopts,[recbuf]}) of
 1645: 	    [{recbuf,RB1}] when RB1 >= Limit -> RB1
 1646: 	end,
 1647:     Data = mk_data(Recbuf+Limit),
 1648:     socket_call(S2, {setopts,[{sndbuf,Recbuf+Limit}]}),
 1649:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,Data}),
 1650:     receive
 1651: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,Data}} -> ok
 1652:     after Timeout ->
 1653: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1654:     end,
 1655:     %%
 1656:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 1657:     receive
 1658: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 1659:     after Timeout ->
 1660: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 1661:     end,
 1662:     receive
 1663: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1664: 					assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 1665:     after Timeout ->
 1666: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 1667:     end,
 1668:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 1669:     [] = flush(),
 1670:     ok.
 1671: 
 1672: mk_data(Bytes) ->
 1673:     mk_data(0, Bytes, <<>>).
 1674: %%
 1675: mk_data(N, Bytes, Bin) when N < Bytes ->
 1676:     mk_data(N+4, Bytes, <<Bin/binary,N:32>>);
 1677: mk_data(_, _, Bin) ->
 1678:     Bin.
 1679: 
 1680: 
 1681: 
 1682: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv4 socket.
 1683: open_multihoming_ipv4_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1684:     ?P("get addrs by family (inet)"),
 1685:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet, 2) of
 1686: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1687:             ?P("got addrs: "
 1688:                "~n      Addr1: ~p"
 1689:                "~n      Addr2: ~p", [Addr1, Addr2]),
 1690: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1691: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1692:             ?P("failed get addrs: "
 1693:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 1694: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1695:     end.
 1696: 
 1697: %% This test is mostly aimed to indicate whether host has a
 1698: %% non-working ipv6 setup.  Test opening a unihoming (non-multihoming)
 1699: %% ipv6 socket.
 1700: open_unihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1701:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 1) of
 1702: 	{ok, [Addr]} ->
 1703: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr], Addr);
 1704: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1705: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1706:     end.
 1707: 
 1708: 
 1709: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket.
 1710: open_multihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1711:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 2) of
 1712: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1713: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1714: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1715: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1716:     end.
 1717: 
 1718: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket with ipv4 and ipv6 addresses.
 1719: open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1720:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet_and_inet6, 2) of
 1721: 	{ok, [[InetAddr1, InetAddr2], [Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2]]} ->
 1722: 	    %% Connect to the first address to test bind
 1723: 	    do_open_and_connect([InetAddr1, Inet6Addr1, InetAddr2],
 1724: 				InetAddr1),
 1725: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, InetAddr1],
 1726: 				Inet6Addr1),
 1727: 
 1728: 	    %% Connect an address, not the first,
 1729: 	    %% to test sctp_bindx
 1730: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1731: 				Inet6Addr2),
 1732: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1733: 				InetAddr1);
 1734: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1735: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1736:     end.
 1737: 
 1738: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1739: names_unihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1740:     do_names(Config, inet, 1).
 1741: 
 1742: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1743: names_unihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1744:     do_names(Config, inet6, 1).
 1745: 
 1746: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1747: names_multihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1748:     do_names(Config, inet, 2).
 1749: 
 1750: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1751: names_multihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1752:     do_names(Config, inet6, 2).
 1753: 
 1754: 
 1755: 
 1756: do_names(_, FamilySpec, AddressCount) ->
 1757:     Fun =
 1758: 	fun (ServerSocket, _, ServerAssoc, ClientSocket, _, ClientAssoc) ->
 1759: 		ServerSocknamesNoassoc =
 1760: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket))),
 1761: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknamesNoassoc),
 1762: 		ServerSocknames =
 1763: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1764: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknames),
 1765: 		[_|_] =
 1766: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1767: 		      (ServerSocknamesNoassoc, ServerSocknames),
 1768: 		ClientSocknamesNoassoc =
 1769: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket))),
 1770: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknamesNoassoc),
 1771: 		ClientSocknames =
 1772: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1773: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknames),
 1774: 		[_|_] =
 1775: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1776: 		      (ClientSocknamesNoassoc, ClientSocknames),
 1777: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ServerSocket)),
 1778: 		ServerPeernames =
 1779: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1780: 		?LOGVAR(ServerPeernames),
 1781: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ClientSocket)),
 1782: 		ClientPeernames =
 1783: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1784: 		?LOGVAR(ClientPeernames),
 1785: 		ServerSocknames = ClientPeernames,
 1786: 		ClientSocknames = ServerPeernames,
 1787: 		{ok,Socket} =
 1788: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc),
 1789: 		SocknamesNoassoc =
 1790: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket))),
 1791: 		?LOGVAR(SocknamesNoassoc),
 1792: 		Socknames =
 1793: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1794: 		?LOGVAR(Socknames),
 1795: 		true =
 1796: 		    ordsets:is_subset(SocknamesNoassoc, Socknames),
 1797: 		Peernames =
 1798: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1799: 		?LOGVAR(Peernames),
 1800: 		ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 1801: 		Socknames = ClientPeernames,
 1802: 		ClientSocknames = Peernames,
 1803: 		ok
 1804: 	end,
 1805:     case get_addrs_by_family(FamilySpec, AddressCount) of
 1806: 	{ok, Addresses} when length(Addresses) =:= AddressCount ->
 1807: 	    do_open_and_connect(Addresses, hd(Addresses), Fun);
 1808: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1809: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1810:     end.
 1811: 
 1812: 
 1813: 
 1814: get_addrs_by_family(Family, NumAddrs) ->
 1815:     case os:type() of
 1816: 	{unix,linux} ->
 1817: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1818: 	{unix,freebsd} ->
 1819: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1820: 	{unix,sunos} ->
 1821: 	    case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1822: 		{ok, [InetAddrs, Inet6Addrs]} when Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1823: 		    %% Man page for sctp_bindx on Solaris says: "If sock is an
 1824: 		    %% Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPv6) socket, addrs should
 1825: 		    %% be an array of sockaddr_in6 structures containing IPv6
 1826: 		    %% or IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses."
 1827: 		    {ok, [ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs), Inet6Addrs]};
 1828: 		{ok, Addrs} ->
 1829: 		    {ok, Addrs};
 1830: 		{error, Reason} ->
 1831: 		    {error, Reason}
 1832: 	    end;
 1833: 	Os ->
 1834: 	    Reason = if Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1835: 			     ?F("Mixing ipv4 and ipv6 addresses for "
 1836: 			       " multihoming has not been verified on ~p",
 1837:                                 [Os]);
 1838: 			true ->
 1839: 			     ?F("Multihoming for ~p has not been verified "
 1840:                                 "on ~p", [Family, Os])
 1841: 		     end,
 1842: 	    {error, Reason}
 1843:     end.
 1844: 
 1845: get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) when Family =:= inet;
 1846: 					       Family =:= inet6 ->
 1847:     case inet:getaddr(localhost, Family) of
 1848: 	{error, eafnosupport = Reason} ->
 1849:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1850: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1851:         {error, nxdomain = Reason} ->
 1852:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1853: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1854: 	{ok, _} ->
 1855:             ?P("got addr for localhost (ignored)"),
 1856: 	    IfAddrs = ok(inet:getifaddrs()),
 1857:             ?P("IfAddrs: ~p", [IfAddrs]),
 1858: 	    case filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) of
 1859: 		Addrs when length(Addrs) >= NumAddrs ->
 1860: 		    {ok, lists:sublist(Addrs, NumAddrs)};
 1861: 		[] ->
 1862: 		    {error, ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found none~n",
 1863:                                [NumAddrs, Family])};
 1864: 		Addrs ->
 1865: 		    {error,
 1866: 		     ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found only ~p: ~p~n",
 1867:                         [NumAddrs, Family, length(Addrs), Addrs])}
 1868: 	    end
 1869:     end;
 1870: get_addrs_by_family_aux(inet_and_inet6, NumAddrs) ->
 1871:     try {ok, [case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1872:                   {ok, Addrs}     -> Addrs;
 1873:                   {error, Reason} -> throw({error, Reason})
 1874:               end || Family <- [inet, inet6]]}
 1875:     catch
 1876:         throw:{error, _} = ERROR ->
 1877:             ERROR
 1878:     end.
 1879: 
 1880: filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) ->
 1881:     lists:flatten([[Addr || {addr, Addr} <- Info,
 1882: 			    is_good_addr(Addr, Family)]
 1883: 		   || {_IfName, Info} <- IfAddrs]).
 1884: 
 1885: is_good_addr(Addr, inet) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 ->
 1886:     true;
 1887: is_good_addr({0,0,0,0,0,16#ffff,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1888:     false; %% ipv4 mapped
 1889: is_good_addr({16#fe80,_,_,_,_,_,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1890:     false; %% link-local
 1891: is_good_addr(Addr, inet6) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 ->
 1892:     true;
 1893: is_good_addr(_Addr, _Family) ->
 1894:     false.
 1895: 
 1896: ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs) ->
 1897:     [begin
 1898: 	 <<AB:16>> = <<A,B>>,
 1899: 	 <<CD:16>> = <<C,D>>,
 1900: 	 {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 16#ffff, AB, CD}
 1901:      end || {A,B,C,D} <- InetAddrs].
 1902: 
 1903: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo) ->
 1904:     Fun = fun (_, _, _, _, _, _) -> ok end,
 1905:     do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun).
 1906: %%
 1907: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun) ->
 1908:     {ServerFamily, ServerOpts} = get_family_by_addrs(ServerAddresses),
 1909:     io:format("Serving ~p addresses: ~p~n",
 1910: 	      [ServerFamily, ServerAddresses]),
 1911:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip,Addr} || Addr <- ServerAddresses] ++
 1912: 			      [ServerFamily|ServerOpts])),
 1913:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1914:     P1 = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1915:     ClientFamily = get_family_by_addr(AddressToConnectTo),
 1916:     io:format("Connecting to ~p ~p~n",
 1917: 	      [ClientFamily, AddressToConnectTo]),
 1918:     ClientOpts =
 1919: 	[ClientFamily |
 1920: 	 case ClientFamily of
 1921: 	     inet6 ->
 1922: 		 [{ipv6_v6only,true}];
 1923: 	     _ ->
 1924: 		 []
 1925: 	 end],
 1926:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, ClientOpts)),
 1927:     log(open),
 1928:     %% Verify client can connect
 1929:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = S2Assoc =
 1930: 	ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, AddressToConnectTo, P1, [])),
 1931:     log(comm_up),
 1932:     %% verify server side also receives comm_up from client
 1933:     S1Assoc = recv_comm_up_eventually(S1),
 1934:     Result = Fun(S1, ServerFamily, S1Assoc, S2, ClientFamily, S2Assoc),
 1935:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1936:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1937:     Result.
 1938: 
 1939: %% If at least one of the addresses is an ipv6 address, return inet6, else inet.
 1940: get_family_by_addrs(Addresses) ->
 1941:     case lists:usort([get_family_by_addr(Addr) || Addr <- Addresses]) of
 1942: 	[inet, inet6] -> {inet6, [{ipv6_v6only, false}]};
 1943: 	[inet]        -> {inet,  []};
 1944: 	[inet6]       -> {inet6, []}
 1945:     end.
 1946: 
 1947: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 -> inet;
 1948: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 -> inet6.
 1949: 
 1950: recv_comm_up_eventually(S) ->
 1951:     case ok(gen_sctp:recv(S)) of
 1952: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info,
 1953: 	 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = Assoc} ->
 1954: 	    Assoc;
 1955: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info, _OtherSctpMsg} = Msg ->
 1956: 	    log({unexpected,Msg}),
 1957: 	    recv_comm_up_eventually(S)
 1958:     end.
 1959: 
 1960: 
 1961: %% 
 1962: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1963:     ?P("create server socket (and listen)"),
 1964:     {ok, S} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1965:     gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1966:     {ok, SPort} = inet:port(S),
 1967: 
 1968:     ?P("create client socket (and connect)"),
 1969:     {ok, C} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1970:     {ok, _} = gen_sctp:connect(C, localhost, SPort, []),
 1971: 
 1972:     TC = self(),
 1973:     RECV = fun() ->
 1974:                    ?P("try setup recv(s)"),
 1975:                    ok = recv_close_setup_recv(S),
 1976:                    ?P("announce ready"),
 1977:                    TC ! {self(), ready},
 1978:                    ?P("try data recv"),
 1979:                    Res = gen_sctp:recv(S),
 1980:                    ?P("recv res: "
 1981:                       "~n   ~p", [Res]),
 1982:                    exit(Res)
 1983:            end,
 1984:     ?P("spawn reader - then await reader ready"),
 1985:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(RECV),
 1986:     receive
 1987:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PreReason} ->
 1988:             %% Make sure it does not die for some other reason...
 1989:             ?P("unexpected reader termination:"
 1990:                "~n   ~p", [PreReason]),
 1991:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 1992:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 1993:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close from reader (~p): ~p",
 1994:                           [Pid, PreReason]);
 1995:         {Pid, ready} ->
 1996:             ?P("reader ready"),
 1997:             ok
 1998:     after 30000 -> % Just in case...
 1999:             %% This is **extreme**, but there is no way to know
 2000:             %% how long it will take to iterate through all the
 2001:             %% addresses of a host...
 2002:             ?P("reader ready timeout"),
 2003:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2004:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2005:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close timeout (~p)", [Pid])
 2006:     end,
 2007: 
 2008:     ?P("\"ensure\" reader reading..."),
 2009:     receive
 2010:         Any ->
 2011:             ?P("Received unexpected message: "
 2012:                "~n   ~p", [Any]),
 2013:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2014:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2015:             ct:fail("Unexpected message: ~p", [Any])
 2016:     after 5000 ->
 2017:             ok
 2018:     end,
 2019: 
 2020:     ?P("close server socket"),
 2021:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 2022:     ?P("await reader termination"),
 2023:     receive
 2024:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {error, closed}} ->
 2025:             ?P("expected reader termination result"),
 2026:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2027:             ok;
 2028:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PostReason} ->
 2029:             ?P("unexpected reader termination: "
 2030:                "~n   ~p", [PostReason]),
 2031:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2032:             ct:fail("Unexpected post close from reader (~p): ~p",
 2033:                           [Pid, PostReason])
 2034:     after 5000 ->
 2035:             ?P("unexpected reader termination timeout"),
 2036:             demonitor(MRef, [flush]),
 2037:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2038:             exit(Pid, kill),
 2039:             ct:fail("Reader (~p) termination timeout", [Pid])
 2040:     end,
 2041:     ?P("close client socket"),
 2042:     (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2043:     ?P("done"),
 2044:     ok.
 2045: 
 2046: 
 2047: recv_close_setup_recv(S) ->
 2048:     recv_close_setup_recv(S, 1).
 2049: 
 2050: recv_close_setup_recv(S, N) ->
 2051:     ?P("try setup recv ~w", [N]),
 2052:     case gen_sctp:recv(S, 5000) of
 2053:         {ok, {Addr,
 2054:               Port,
 2055:               _AncData, 
 2056:               Data}} when is_tuple(Addr) andalso is_integer(Port) ->
 2057:             ?P("setup recv ~w: "
 2058:                "~n   ~p", [N, Data]),
 2059:             recv_close_setup_recv(S, N+1);
 2060:         {error, timeout} ->
 2061:             ok
 2062:     end.
 2063: 
 2064: 
 2065: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2066: 
 2067: %% This is the most basic of (sockaddr) tests.
 2068: 
 2069: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2070:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2071:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2072:             fun() -> ok end,
 2073:             fun() ->
 2074:                     Domain = inet,
 2075:                     LocalAddr =
 2076:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2077:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2078:                                 LA;
 2079:                             {error, _} ->
 2080:                                 skip("No local address")
 2081:                         end,
 2082:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2083:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2084:                                  port     => 0},
 2085:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2086:             end).
 2087: 
 2088: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2089:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2090:             fun() -> ok end,
 2091:             fun() ->
 2092:                     Domain = inet,
 2093:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2094:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2095:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2096:                                 LLA;
 2097:                             {error, _} ->
 2098:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2099:                         end,
 2100:                     SockAddr = #{family => Domain,
 2101:                                  addr   => LinkLocalAddr,
 2102:                                  port   => 0},
 2103:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2104:             end).
 2105: 
 2106: 
 2107: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2108:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2109:             fun() -> ?LIB:has_support_ipv6() end,
 2110:             fun() ->
 2111:                     Domain = inet6,
 2112:                     LocalAddr =
 2113:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2114:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2115:                                 LA;
 2116:                         {error, _} ->
 2117:                             skip("No local address")
 2118:                     end,
 2119:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2120:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2121:                                  port     => 0},
 2122:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2123:             end).
 2124: 
 2125: 
 2126: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2127:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2128:             fun() ->
 2129:                     ?LIB:has_support_ipv6(),
 2130:                     is_net_supported(),
 2131:                     is_not_freebsd()
 2132:             end,
