 2133:             fun() ->
 2134:                     Domain = inet6,
 2135:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2136:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2137:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2138:                                 LLA;
 2139:                             {error, _} ->
 2140:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2141:                         end,
 2142:                     Filter =
 2143:                         fun(#{addr := #{family := D,
 2144:                                         addr   := A}} = C) ->
 2145:                                 if
 2146:                                     (D =:= Domain) andalso
 2147:                                     (A =:= LinkLocalAddr) ->
 2148:                                         ?P("found link-local candidate: "
 2149:                                            "~n   ~p", [C]),
 2150:                                         true;
 2151:                                     true ->
 2152:                                         false
 2153:                                 end;                                        
 2154:                            (_) ->
 2155:                                 false
 2156:                         end,
 2157:                     case net:getifaddrs(Filter) of
 2158:                         {ok, [#{addr := #{scope_id := ScopeID}} = H|T]} ->
 2159:                             ?P("found link-local candidate(s): "
 2160:                                "~n   Candidate:         ~p"
 2161:                                "~n   Rest Candidate(s): ~p", [H, T]),
 2162:                             SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2163:                                          addr     => LinkLocalAddr,
 2164:                                          port     => 0,
 2165:                                          scope_id => ScopeID},
 2166:                             do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config);
 2167:                         {ok, _} ->
 2168:                             skip("Scope ID not found");
 2169:                         {error, R} ->
 2170:                             skip({failed_getifaddrs, R})
 2171:                     end
 2172:             end).
 2173: 
 2174: do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(#{family := _Fam} = SockAddr, _) ->
 2175:     %% Create the server
 2176:     Self   = self(),
 2177:     ?P("~n      SockAddr: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 2178:     ServerF = fun() ->
 2179:                       ?P("[server] try create (open) listen socket"),
 2180:                       Sock =
 2181:                           try gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2182:                                              {active, true},
 2183:                                              binary]) of
 2184:                               {ok, S} ->
 2185:                                   S;
 2186:                               {error, OReason} ->
 2187:                                   ?P("open error: "
 2188:                                      "~n      Reason: ~p", [OReason]),
 2189:                                   exit({open_error, OReason})
 2190:                           catch
 2191:                               OC:OE:OS ->
 2192:                                   ?P("open failure: "
 2193:                                      "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 2194:                                      "~n      Error:       ~p"
 2195:                                      "~n      Call Stack:  ~p", [OC, OE, OS]),
 2196:                                   exit({open_failure, {OC, OE, OS}})
 2197:                           end,
 2198: 
 2199:                       ?P("[server] try make 'listen' socket"),
 2200:                       ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sock, true),
 2201: 
 2202:                       ?P("[server] try get port number"),
 2203:                       {ok, Port}  = inet:port(Sock),
 2204:                       ?P("[server] port: ~w", [Port]),
 2205:                       Self ! {{port, Port}, self()},
 2206: 
 2207: 
 2208:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2209:                       AssocID1 =
 2210:                           receive
 2211:                               {sctp,
 2212:                                Sock,
 2213:                                FromIP11, FromPort11,
 2214:                                {ANC1, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2215:                                                          error            = 0,
 2216:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams1,
 2217:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams1,
 2218:                                                          assoc_id         = AID1}}} ->
 2219:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2220:                                      "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2221:                                      "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2222:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2223:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2224:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2225:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2226:                                      [FromIP11, FromPort11, ANC1,
 2227:                                       OutStreams1, InStreams1, AID1]),
 2228:                                   AID1
 2229:                           end,
 2230: 
 2231:                       ?P("[server] await message 2"),
 2232:                       receive
 2233:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP12, FromPort12, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2234:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2235:                                  "~n      FromIP2:   ~p"
 2236:                                  "~n      FromPort2: ~p"
 2237:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP12, FromPort12]),
 2238:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID1, 1, "hopp")
 2239:                       end,
 2240: 
 2241: 
 2242:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2243:                       AssocID2 =
 2244:                           receive
 2245:                               {sctp,
 2246:                                Sock,
 2247:                                FromIP21, FromPort21,
 2248:                                {ANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2249:                                                          error            = 0,
 2250:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams2,
 2251:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams2,
 2252:                                                          assoc_id         = AID2}}} ->
 2253:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2254:                                      "~n      FromIP:      ~p"
 2255:                                      "~n      FromPort:    ~p"
 2256:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2257:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2258:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2259:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2260:                                      [FromIP21, FromPort21, ANC2,
 2261:                                       OutStreams2, InStreams2, AID2]),
 2262:                                   AID2
 2263:                           end,
 2264: 
 2265:                       ?P("[server] await message 1"),
 2266:                       receive
 2267:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP22, FromPort22, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2268:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2269:                                  "~n      From IP:   ~p"
 2270:                                  "~n      From Port: ~p"
 2271:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP22, FromPort22]),
 2272:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID2, 1, "hopp")
 2273:                       end,
 2274: 
 2275: 
 2276:                       ?P("[server] await termination command"),
 2277:                       receive
 2278:                           {die, Self} ->
 2279:                               ?P("[server] terminating"),
 2280:                               (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 2281:                               exit(normal)
 2282:                       end
 2283:               end,
 2284:     ?P("try start server"),
 2285:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 2286:     ?P("server started - await port "),
 2287:     ServerPort = receive
 2288:                      {{port, Port}, Server} ->
 2289:                          Port;
 2290:                      {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 2291:                          ?P("server died unexpectedly: "
 2292:                             "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2293:                          exit({unexpected_server_failure, Reason})
 2294:                  end,
 2295:     ?P("server port received: ~p", [ServerPort]),
 2296:     
 2297: 
 2298:     ?P("try create client socket 1"),
 2299:     {ok, CSock1} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2300:                                   {active, true},
 2301:                                   binary]),
 2302: 
 2303:     ?P("client socket 1: "
 2304:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2305:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock1, inet:port(CSock1)]),
 2306: 
 2307:     ?P("try connect client socket 1"),
 2308:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2309:     {COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1} =
 2310:         case gen_sctp:connect(CSock1, ServerSockAddr, [], ?SECS(1)) of
 2311:             {ok, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2312:                                     error            = 0,
 2313:                                     outbound_streams = COS1,
 2314:                                     inbound_streams  = CIS1,
 2315:                                     assoc_id         = CAID1}} ->
 2316:                 {COS1, CIS1, CAID1};
 2317:             {ok, Unexpected1} ->
 2318:                 ?P("<ERROR> unexpected connect (1) result: "
 2319:                    "~n      ~p", [Unexpected1]),
 2320:                 ct:fail({unexpected_client_connect_result, 1, Unexpected1});
 2321:             {error, Reason1} ->
 2322:                 ?P("<ERROR> failed client 1 connect: "
 2323:                    "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason1]),
 2324:                 ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 1, Reason1})
 2325:         end,
 2326: 
 2327:     ?P("client 1 connected: "
 2328:        "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2329:        "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2330:        "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p", [COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1]),
 2331: 
 2332:     ?P("[client 1] try send message"),
 2333:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock1, CAssocID1, 1, "hej"),
 2334: 
 2335:     ?P("[client 1] await reply message"),
 2336:     receive
 2337:         {sctp, CSock1, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2338:             ?P("received expected reply message")
 2339:     end,
 2340: 
 2341: 
 2342:     ?P("[client 2] try create client socket"),
 2343:     {ok, CSock2} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2344:                                   {active, true},
 2345:                                   binary]),
 2346: 
 2347:     ?P("[client 2] client socket: "
 2348:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2349:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock2, inet:port(CSock2)]),
 2350: 
 2351:     ?P("[client 2] try connect-init"),
 2352:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2353:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(CSock2, ServerSockAddr, []) of
 2354:         ok ->
 2355:             ok;
 2356:         {error, Reason2} ->
 2357:             ?P("<ERROR> failed client 2 connect: "
 2358:                "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason2]),
 2359:             ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 2, Reason2})
 2360:     end,
 2361: 
 2362:     ?P("[client 2] await connect completion"),
 2363:     CAssocID2 =
 2364:         receive
 2365:             {sctp,
 2366:              CSock2,
 2367:              CFromIP2, CFromPort2,
 2368:              {CANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2369:                                         error            = 0,
 2370:                                         outbound_streams = COutStreams2,
 2371:                                         inbound_streams  = CInStreams2,
 2372:                                         assoc_id         = CAID2}}} ->
 2373:                 ?P("[client 2] connected: "
 2374:                    "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2375:                    "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2376:                    "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2377:                    "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2378:                    "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2379:                    "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2380:                    [CFromIP2, CFromPort2, CANC2,
 2381:                     COutStreams2, CInStreams2, CAID2]),
 2382:                 CAID2
 2383:         end,
 2384: 
 2385:     ?P("[client 2] try send message"),
 2386:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock2, CAssocID2, 1, "hej"),
 2387: 
 2388:     ?P("[client 2] await reply message"),
 2389:     receive
 2390:         {sctp, CSock2, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2391:             ?P("[client 2] received expected reply message")
 2392:     end,
 2393: 
 2394: 
 2395:     ?P("terminate server"),
 2396:     Server ! {die, self()},
 2397: 
 2398:     ?P("await server termination"),
 2399:     receive
 2400:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 2401:             ok
 2402:     end,
 2403:     
 2404:     ?P("cleanup"),
 2405:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock1)),
 2406:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock2)),
 2407: 
 2408:     ?P("done"),
 2409:     ok.
 2410: 
 2411:     
 2412: %% Test the sockaddr version of connectx_init/4.
 2413: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2414:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
 2415:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2416:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 2417:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2418:     SockAddr = #{family   => inet,
 2419:                  addr     => Localhost,
 2420:                  port     => Pb},
 2421:     case gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []) of
 2422:         {ok, A1} ->
 2423: 	    true = (A1 =/= 0),
 2424:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
 2425:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2426:             ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 2427:             {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []),
 2428: 	    true = (A2 =/= 0),
 2429:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
 2430:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2431:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 2432:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb);
 2433:         {error, enotsup} ->
 2434:             ok
 2435:     end,
 2436:     ok.
 2437: 
 2438: 
 2439: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2440: %%% socket gen_server ultra light
 2441: 
 2442: socket_open(SockOpts0, Timeout) ->
 2443:     SockOpts =
 2444: 	case lists:keyfind(active,1,SockOpts0) of
 2445: 	    false ->
 2446: 		[{active,once}|SockOpts0];
 2447: 	    _ ->
 2448: 		SockOpts0
 2449: 	end,
 2450:     Opts = [{type,seqpacket},binary|SockOpts],
 2451:     Starter =
 2452: 	fun () ->
 2453: 		{ok,Socket} =
 2454: 		    gen_sctp:open(Opts),
 2455: 		Socket
 2456: 	end,
 2457:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2458: 
 2459: socket_peeloff(Socket, AssocId, SocketOpts, Timeout) ->
 2460:     Opts = [binary|SocketOpts],
 2461:     Starter =
 2462: 	fun () ->
 2463: 		{ok,NewSocket} =
 2464: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(Socket, AssocId),
 2465: 		ok = inet:setopts(NewSocket, Opts),
 2466: 		NewSocket
 2467: 	end,
 2468:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2469: 
 2470: socket_close_verbose(S, StartTime) ->
 2471:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2472:     io:format("socket_close ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2473:     History.
 2474: 
 2475: socket_close(S) ->
 2476:     s_req(S, close).
 2477: 
 2478: socket_call(S, Request) ->
 2479:     s_req(S, {Request}).
 2480: 
 2481: %% socket_get(S, Key) ->
 2482: %%     s_req(S, {get,Key}).
 2483: 
 2484: socket_bailout([S|Ss], StartTime) ->
 2485:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2486:     io:format("bailout ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2487:     socket_bailout(Ss, StartTime);
 2488: socket_bailout([], _) ->
 2489:     io:format("flush: ~p.~n", [flush()]),
 2490:     ct:fail(socket_bailout).
 2491: 
 2492: socket_history({State,Flush}, StartTime) ->
 2493:     {lists:keysort(
 2494:        2,
 2495:        lists:flatten(
 2496: 	 [[{Key,{TS-StartTime,Val}} || {TS,Val} <- Vals]
 2497: 	  || {Key,Vals} <- gb_trees:to_list(State)])),
 2498:      Flush}.
 2499: 
 2500: s_handler(Socket) ->
 2501:     fun ({listen,Listen}) ->
 2502: 	    ok = gen_sctp:listen(Socket, Listen);
 2503: 	(get_port) ->
 2504: 	    ok(inet:port(Socket));
 2505: 	(get_socket) ->
 2506: 	    Socket;
 2507: 	({connect_init,ConAddr,ConPort,ConOpts}) ->
 2508: 	    ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Socket, ConAddr, ConPort, ConOpts);
 2509: 	({send,AssocId,Stream,Data}) ->
 2510: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(Socket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2511: 	({send,OtherSocket,AssocId,Stream,Data}) ->
 2512: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(OtherSocket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2513: 	({setopts,Opts}) ->
 2514: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, Opts);
 2515: 	({getopts,Optnames}) ->
 2516: 	    ok(inet:getopts(Socket, Optnames))
 2517:     end.
 2518: 
 2519: s_req(S, Req) ->
 2520:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, S),
 2521:     S ! {self(),Mref,Req},
 2522:     receive
 2523: 	{'DOWN',Mref,_,_,Error} ->
 2524: 	    exit(Error);
 2525: 	{S,Mref,Reply} ->
 2526: 	    erlang:demonitor(Mref, [flush]),
 2527: 	    Reply
 2528:     end.
 2529: 
 2530: s_start(Starter, Timeout) ->
 2531:     Parent = self(),
 2532:     Owner =
 2533: 	spawn_link(
 2534: 	  fun () ->
 2535: 		  s_start(Starter(), Timeout, Parent)
 2536: 	  end),
 2537:     Owner.
 2538: 
 2539: s_start(Socket, Timeout, Parent) ->
 2540:     Handler = s_handler(Socket),
 2541:     try
 2542: 	s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, gb_trees:empty())
 2543:     catch
 2544: 	Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 2545: 	    io:format(?MODULE_STRING":socket exception ~w:~w at~n"
 2546: 		      "~p.~n", [Class,Reason,Stacktrace]),
 2547: 	    erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2548:     end.
 2549: 
 2550: s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, State) ->
 2551:     receive
 2552: 	{Parent,Ref,close} -> % socket_close()
 2553: 	    erlang:send_after(Timeout, self(), {Parent,Ref,exit}),
 2554: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, State);
 2555: 	{Parent,Ref,exit} ->
 2556: 	    ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 2557: 	    Key = exit,
 2558: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, Socket, State),
 2559: 	    Parent ! {self(),Ref,{NewState,flush()}};
 2560: 	{Parent,Ref,{Msg}} ->
 2561: 	    Result = Handler(Msg),
 2562: 	    Key = req,
 2563: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Msg,Result}, State),
 2564: 	    Parent ! {self(),Ref,Result},
 2565: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, NewState);
 2566: 	%% {Parent,Ref,{get,Key}} ->
 2567: 	%%     Parent ! {self(),Ref,gb_get(Key, State)},
 2568: 	%%     s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, State);
 2569: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2570: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,assoc_id=AssocId}=SRI],Data}}
 2571: 	  when not is_tuple(Data) ->
 2572: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2573: 		[{Addr,Port,
 2574: 		  #sctp_assoc_change{
 2575: 		     state=comm_up,
 2576: 		     inbound_streams=Is}}|_]
 2577: 		  when 0 =< Stream, Stream < Is-> ok;
 2578: 		[] -> ok
 2579: 	    end,
 2580: 	    Key = {msg,AssocId,Stream},
 2581: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SRI,Data}, State),
 2582: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,AssocId,Stream,Data}},
 2583: 	    again(Socket),
 2584: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, NewState);
 2585: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2586: 	 {SRI,#sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId,state=St}=SAC}} ->
 2587: 	    case SRI of
 2588: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2589: 		[] -> ok
 2590: 	    end,
 2591: 	    Key = {assoc_change,AssocId},
 2592: 	    case {gb_get(Key, State),St} of
 2593: 		{[],_} -> ok;
 2594: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2595: 		  when St =:= comm_lost; St =:= shutdown_comp -> ok
 2596: 	    end,
 2597: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SAC}, State),
 2598: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,SAC}},
 2599: 	    again(Socket),
 2600: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, NewState);
 2601: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2602: 	 {SRI,#sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId,
 2603: 				 addr={_,P},
 2604: 				 state=St}=SPC}} ->
 2605: 	    match_unless_solaris(Port, P),
 2606: 	    case SRI of
 2607: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2608: 		[] -> ok
 2609: 	    end,
 2610: 	    case {gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State),St} of
 2611: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2612: 		  when St =:= addr_available;
 2613: 		       St =:= addr_confirmed -> ok;
 2614: 		{[],addr_confirmed} -> ok
 2615: 	    end,
 2616: 	    Key = {paddr_change,AssocId},
 2617: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SPC}, State),
 2618: 	    again(Socket),
 2619: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, NewState);
 2620: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2621: 	 {SRI,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=AssocId}=SSE}} ->
 2622: 	    case SRI of
 2623: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2624: 		[] -> ok
 2625: 	    end,
 2626: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2627: 		[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_] -> ok;
 2628: 		[] -> ok
 2629: 	    end,
 2630: 	    Key = {shutdown_event,AssocId},
 2631: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port}, State),
 2632: 	    Parent ! {self(), {Addr,Port,SSE}},
 2633: 	    again(Socket),
 2634: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, Handler, NewState);
 2635: 	Unexpected ->
 2636: 	    erlang:error({unexpected,Unexpected})
 2637:     end.
 2638: 
 2639: again(Socket) ->
 2640:     receive
 2641: 	{sctp_passive,Socket} ->
 2642: 	    [{active, false}] = ok(inet:getopts(Socket, [active])),
 2643: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket,[{active,1}])
 2644:     after 0 ->
 2645: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{active,once}])
 2646:     end.
 2647: 
 2648: gb_push(Key, Val, GBT) ->
 2649:     TS = timestamp(),
 2650:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 2651: 	none ->
 2652: 	    gb_trees:insert(Key, [{TS,Val}], GBT);
 2653: 	{value,V} ->
 2654: 	    gb_trees:update(Key, [{TS,Val}|V], GBT)
 2655:     end.
 2656: 
 2657: gb_get(Key, GBT) ->
 2658:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 2659: 	none ->
 2660: 	    [];
 2661: 	{value,V} ->
 2662: 	    [Val || {_TS,Val} <- V]
 2663:     end.
 2664: 
 2665: match_unless_solaris(A, B) ->
 2666:     case os:type() of
 2667: 	{unix,sunos} -> B;
 2668: 	_ -> A = B
 2669:     end.
 2670: 
 2671: 
 2672: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2673: 
 2674: is_net_supported() ->
 2675:     try net:info() of
 2676:         #{} ->
 2677:             ok
 2678:     catch
 2679:         error : notsup ->
 2680:             not_supported(net)
 2681:     end.
 2682: 
 2683: 
 2684: is_not_freebsd() ->
 2685:     is_not_platform(freebsd, "FreeBSD").
 2686: 
 2687: is_not_platform(Platform, PlatformStr)
 2688:   when is_atom(Platform) andalso is_list(PlatformStr) ->
 2689:       case os:type() of
 2690:         {unix, Platform} ->
 2691:             skip("This does not work on " ++ PlatformStr);
 2692:         _ ->
 2693:             ok
 2694:     end.
 2695: 
 2696: 
 2697: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2698: 
 2699: timestamp() ->
 2700:     erlang:monotonic_time().
 2701: 
 2702: 
 2703: pi(Item) ->
 2704:     {Item, Val} = process_info(self(), Item),
 2705:     Val.
 2706:     
 2707: 
 2708: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2709: 
 2710: not_supported(What) ->
 2711:     skip({not_supported, What}).
 2712: 
 2713: skip(Reason) ->
 2714:     throw({skip, Reason}).
 2715: 
 2716: 
 2717: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2718: 
 2719: log_ok(X) ->
 2720:     log(ok(X)).
 2721: 
 2722: ok({ok, X}) ->
 2723:     X;
 2724: ok({error, X}) ->
 2725:     ?P("ERROR: ~p", [X]),
 2726:     ct:fail({unexpected_error, X});
 2727: ok(X) ->
 2728:     ?P("UNEXPECTED: ~p", [X]),
 2729:     ct:fail({unexpected, X}).
 2730:     
 2731: 
 2732: log(X) ->
 2733:     ?P("LOG: ~p", [X]),
 2734:     X.
 2735: 
 2736: err([], Result) ->
 2737:     erlang:error(Result);
 2738: err([Reason|_], {error,Reason}) ->
 2739:     ok;
 2740: err([_|Reasons], Result) ->
 2741:     err(Reasons, Result).
 2742: 
 2743: 
 2744: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2745: 
 2746: open_failed_str(Reason) ->
 2747:     ?F("Open failed: ~w", [Reason]).
 2748:
